deleteRoleDialog.title: Re-assign Contents
deleteRoleDialog.reassign_role: Re-assign the role of this user to the following user's role

users.title: Users
users.password_line_1: Password length almost 8 characters. If you don't want to change the password, keep the text field empty.

deleteUserDialog.title: Re-assign Contents
deleteUserDialog.reassign_content: Re-assign the content of this user to the following user

custom_fields.title: Custom Fields
custom_fields.checkbox_single_option: The selected type accepts only one option
custom_fields.min_image_w_hint: Insert the minimum width of the image in pixel
custom_fields.min_image_h_hint: Insert the minimum height of the image in pixel
custom_fields.image_operation_hint: Select the operation to make on upload
custom_fields.max_file_size_hint: Insert the max file size for an uploaded file, the value must be below 16
custom_fields.allowed_types_hint: Insert the list of accepted extensions

content_types.title: Content Types
content_types.only_alphanum: Only lowercase characters, numbers and the char '_'
content_types.line_1: The single content will be shown with the template called

settings.title: Settings
settings.placeholder: Choose the Homepage for the language

resize_media.title: Resize Media
resize_media.line_1: Use this tool to regenerate all the thumbnails for the images uploaded on the site.
resize_media.line_2: The old thumbnails will be kept to avoid not working images.
resize_media.line_3: The regeneration of the thumbnails is not reversible, but you can re-set the previous sizes and regenerate the thumbnails again.
resize_media.line_4: To start, choose the content type and press the button below.

sitemap.title: Sitemap Generator
sitemap.line_1: Use this tool to select the contents that you want to include in the sitemap.
sitemap.line_2: The sitemap is dynamically generated based on the content types choosed.
sitemap.line_3: Select the content types and save your preferences.

validations.email_not_valid: The field Email is not in the right format.
validations.format_not_valid: The field is not in the right format.
validations.password_min_length: The field Password should be at least 8 characters.
validations.content_type_required: The field Content Type is required.
validations.seo_focus_key: The Focus Keyword is not in the right format. Only numbers, letters and spaces allowed.

error.focus_key_length: The Focus Keyword is not set on this page. Set a Focus Keyword, then we can calculate your SEO Score.
error.meta_description_length: The Meta Description is not set. The search engine will show part of the text from your page.
error.content_length: The Content is {{ REPLACE_1 }} words long. This is too far from 300, the minimum numbers of words for your content.
error.seo_title_length: The SEO Title is not set on this page.
error.seo_title_focus_key: The Focus Keyword '{{ REPLACE_1 }}' is not into the SEO Title
error.slug_focus_key: The Focus Keyword '{{ REPLACE_1 }}' is not into the slug
error.focus_key_density: The Focus Keyword was found {{ REPLACE_1 }} times. The maximum number of times for the Focus Keyword in the content is 7.
error.focus_key_intro: The Focus Keyword was not found in the introduction.
error.focus_key_already_used: The Focus Keyword was already used in another page.
error.internal_links: The Content does not contain any internal links.
error.external_links: The Content does not contain any external links.

warning.focus_key_length: The Focus Keyword is {{ REPLACE_1 }} words long. It's longer than 4, the number of suggested words.
warning.meta_description_length: The Meta Description is too short (below 120 characters). 156 characters available. The suggested length is between 120 and 156 characters.
warning.content_length: The Content is {{ REPLACE_1 }} words long. This content is below the minimum of 300 words.
warning.seo_title_length: The SEO title is too short.
warning.seo_title_focus_key: Check if the Focus Keyword is at the beginning of the SEO Title or if the Focus Keyword is partially contained into the SEO Title.

correct.content_length: The Content is {{ REPLACE_1 }} words long. Great!
correct.seo_title_length: The SEO title is ok. Great!
correct.seo_title_focus_key: The Focus Keyword '{{ REPLACE_1 }}' is into the SEO Title! Well done!
correct.slug_focus_key: The Focus Keyword '{{ REPLACE_1 }}' is into the slug! Great!
correct.focus_key_density: The Focus Keyword was found {{ REPLACE_1 }} times. Great!
correct.focus_key_intro: The Focus Keyword was found in the introduction.
correct.focus_key_already_used: The Focus Keyword is used only here. Fantastic!
correct.internal_links: The Content contains internal links. Cool!
correct.external_links: The Content contains external links. Cool!
